title: Pixel 2 xl 1/8 slow motion jerky at times
content:
Recorded 1/4 slow motion, works fine
Recorded 1/8 slow motion in low light, works fine
Recorded 1/8 slow motion in daylight, very jerky & stutters

See the samples here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=89EIlS58F9U

Any idea why this happens and how to resolve it please? With this jerky video, 1/8 slow motion is completely unusable according to me.
